import React from "react"; import { BrowserRouter as Router,Route,Switch } from "react-router-dom"; import Jizan from "../images/jizan.png"; import { Transition } from '@headlessui/react'; import { useState } from 'react'; function Home (){ const [count, setCount] = useState(0); return(
